text: Andreja Lazović (; born 4 August 1994) is a Serbian footballer. As of 2019, he plays for OFK Beograd. ==References== ==External links== * *Andreja Lazović at srbijafudbal.com Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:FK Čukarički players Category:FK BASK players Category:FK Sinđelić Beograd players Category:FK Mačva Šabac players Category:FK Smederevo players Category:FK Jagodina players Category:FC Gorodeya players Category:OFK Beograd players
title: Andreja Lazović
